main event: A large, unknown, bright object was observed at O'Hare International Airport in Chicago, Illinois on December 27, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as a large, unknown object that appeared to be 250-500 feet high, like a two-story building.
The object's color was reported as orange-yellow, as bright as the moon.
The object appeared to fade and grow brighter during the 35-minute observation period.
The object was observed from the ground visually.
The report suggests the object may have been a bright star or the moon, and that commonly misidentified shadows and contrails were observed.
photographs: yes, the report indicates photographs were taken
